content.description: Squat/stand start at the base of the crack, layback to the top of the crack and top out directly on jugs.
content.location: On the left side of the Jade boulder, this is the largest crack, ~5' to the right of the tree.

content.description: Sit start on crimps on the right side of the base of this blank face, pull on and move up and left using a small crimp and making a long reach up to a sloping edge just below the lip. Match up on the edge and then move straight up through jugs to an easy topout.
content.location: The Green Dragon starts on the right side of the Jade wall, on crimps at the bottom of the mostly blank face.

content.description: Start sitting with your left hand on a crappy divot  on the right edge of the crack (like the worst spot you can find on the edge of the crack). The crack and the good holds in the crack are off (the problem is V2ish if you use a good hold in the crack). Fire up to the sloper, match the sloper and topout slightly right.
content.location: Just right of the obvious crack.

content.description: Sit start at the base of the thin right angling crack, move up and right through crack holds that improve as you go. Topout on jugs directly above the top of the crack.
content.location: In the middle of the Jade wall, Black jade is the harder of the two cracks. This problem is in the middle of the wall, to the right of Underground Methods, and left of The Jade Dragon.

content.description: The Jade Boulder is a short wall on the border of the Beyond Summit Area, it sits just downhill from the Space Ship boulder. The main feature of this boulder is a series of vertical cracks and a blank face with some thin crimps on it.
